quote: People think of education as something they can finish.
Blowing out someone else’s candle won’t make yours shine brighter.
Every first draft is perfect, because all a first draft has to do is exist.
I want to be around people that do things. I don’t want to be around people anymore that judge or talk about what people do. I want to be around people that dream and support and do things.
Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.
The miracle is this: the more we share the more we have.
Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
Maybe your weird is my normal. Who's to say?
Gossip needn’t be false to be evil. There’s a lot of truth that shouldn’t be passed around.

The more you know, the more you can do. However, you don’t need to know everything to get things done. Just a bit of know-how is enough to get started on most projects, you can learn the rest along the way. Don’t be afraid to break stuff, it’s all virtual anyway.
source: Yann Dauphin on advice for new programmers

quote: Find a language you love, make cool stuff with it, and never be afraid to experiment.
source: Tom Heinan on advice for new programmers

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle, in order to keep your balance, you must keep moving.
Some people should remain a part of your past and not be a part of your future.
If you're going to do free work, do your own stories and post them online. Own your free work.
Sometimes you can only find Heaven by slowly backing away from Hell.

People want to believe gender is something that’s essential, and people repeat these essentialist ideas all the time. ‘Oh, women do that’ and ‘Oh, men do that’ and the reality is that all women don’t anything. We as individuals do what we do, you know, and sometimes that’s informed by gender and sometimes it’s just who we are. And I think all that just makes people really, really uncomfortable because they don’t want to think about who they are.
Stay afraid, but do it anyway. What’s important is the action. You don’t have to wait to be confident. Just do it and eventually the confidence will follow.
